Package monero.wallet.model

Class MoneroTransferQuery

java.lang.Object
monero.wallet.model.MoneroTransfer
monero.wallet.model.MoneroTransferQuery
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter<MoneroTransfer>
public class MoneroTransferQuery extends MoneroTransfer implements Filter<MoneroTransfer>
Configures a query to retrieve transfers. All transfers are returned except those that do not meet the criteria defined in this query.
